cheatsheet.title: Prepare Workspace

intro.description:
Welcome to BridgePoint.
This step prepares the workspace for creating verifiable xtUML models and systems

item.title: Open the xtUML modeling Perspective
item.description: Select Window > Open Perspective > Other > xtUML modeling Perspective. This step changes the perspective to set up the Eclipse workbench for xtUML modeling.

item.title: Link with editor
item.description: Link your Model Explorer view with the open Graphical/Activity editors, or selected elements in canvas for better viewing.

cheatsheet.onCompletion: Thank you for exploring BridgePoint. Now it's time for you to build some application models. Good luck and have fun!
